revision.text:
{{wiktionary|alien|aliens}}
'''Alien''' or '''Aliens''' may refer to: * [[Alien (law)]], a non-citizen inhabitant of a country * [[Extraterrestrial life]], defined as life that does not originate from Earth * [[List of alleged alien beings]] (ufology) * Any [[introduced species]], a species living outside its native distributional range
== Fiction == === Film === * [[Alien (film)|''Alien'' (film)]], 1979 film directed by Ridley Scott ** [[Aliens (film)|''Aliens'' (film)]], 1986 sequel directed by James Cameron ** [[Alien (creature in Alien franchise)]], the titular creatures of the franchise ** [[Alien (franchise)|''Alien'' (franchise)]], the science fiction horror film franchise * ''[[The Alien]]'', an incomplete 1967 Satyajit Ray film
=== Other fictional works === * [[Aliens (1902 novel)|''Aliens'' (1902 novel)]], by Mary Tappan Wright * [[Aliens (novel series)|''Aliens'' (novel series)]], based on the ''Alien'' franchise characters * [[Aliens (comic book)|''Aliens'' (comic book)]], series based on the ''Alien'' franchise characters * [[Extraterrestrials in fiction]] * [[List of Alien and Predator games]], based on the ''Alien'' and ''Predator'' franchises
== Music == * [[Alien (album)|''Alien'' (album)]], by Strapping Young Lad * [[Alien (band)]], Swedish rock band * [[The Aliens]], Scottish rock band * [[The Aliens (Australian band)]], a 1970s new wave band from Australia * "Alien", song by Tokio Hotel from the album [[Humanoid (album)|''Humanoid'']] * "Alien", song by Pennywise from the album [[Straight Ahead (Pennywise album)|''Straight Ahead'']] * "Alien", song by Erasure from the album ''[[Loveboat]]'' * "Alien", song by Lamb from the album ''[[Fear of Fours]]'' *"Alien", song by Bush from the album "[[Sixteen Stone ]]"
== Technology == * [[Alien (software)]], a computer program * [[Alien Technology]], manufacturer of RFID technology * [[AliEn (ALICE Environment)]], lightweight Grid framework developed by CERN * [[Alienware]], a division of Dell
== Other == * ''Aliens'', the newsletter of the [[Invasive Species Specialist Group]] of the International Union for Conservation of Nature * [[Alien (ship owner)]], company in Saint Petersburg, Russia * [[Alien (signifier)]], term used in literature and criticism * [[Alien Sun]] (born 1974), Singapore-born actress and Miss Singapore of 1994 * ''Alien'', a line of perfumes by [[Thierry Mugler#Fragrances|Thierry Mugler]]
== See also == * {{Lookfrom|Alien}} * {{Intitle|Alien}} * [[Alians (band)]], Polish rock band * ''[[ATLiens]]'', 1996 album by OutKast
{{disambig}}
